body.name: Bluetooth Speaker with HD Sound, Portable Wireless, IPX5 Waterproof, Up to 24H Playtime, TWS Pairing, BT5.3, for Home/Party/Outdoor/Beach, Electronic Gadgets, Birthday Gift (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [Immersive Sound Experience & Dual Connectivity] Experience unparalleled sound quality with this wireless Bluetooth speaker's 2 drivers and advanced technology that delivers powerful, well-balanced sound with minimal distortion. Connect two speakers together to create an immersive stereo sound experience and fill any room with powerful sound. Perfect for gaming, music, and movie playback.

[Tough & Weather-Resistant] Engineered to handle rough use and adverse weather conditions, this speaker features a durable design and an IPX5 rating for protection against water splashes and spills. It's an ideal choice for outdoor events, and is perfect for use at parties, at the pool, on the beach, while camping or hiking, and more.

[Long-lasting Playtime & Extended Bluetooth Connectivity] Experience extended playtime with up to 24 hours per charge and extended wireless range with Bluetooth 5.3, reaching up to 100 feet from your device. The multicolor lights on the speaker can also be turned off with a simple button press to save the battery and adapt to your needs. Keep in mind that the actual playtime can vary depending on volume level, audio content, and usage.

[Vibrant Light Effects] Bring a new level of excitement to your party with the dynamic multi-color light show that syncs to the beat of the music, you can easily customize the light effects to suit your preference by simply pressing the Light button. Make any gathering more memorable with these visually stunning light effects that will elevate the atmosphere.

[Everything You Need] The package includes 1 waterproof Bluetooth speaker, 1 Type-C charging cable, and a quick start guide, all backed by lifetime technical support. The built-in microphone allows for hands-free phone calls and you can also play music from other devices using the AUX jack (not included). It's a perfect gift for music lovers and tech enthusiasts alike.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Small Speaker, Big Sound. Experience unparalleled sound quality with our top-of-the-line Bluetooth speaker. Bring the party with you, wherever you go. Play your favorite tunes, adjust the volume, and even take calls all with the touch of a button. Up to 24H Playtime This rechargeable battery can provide up to 24 hours of playback at 50% volume and lights off. LED Breathing Light The dancers move to the beat of the music, their breath, and bodies synchronizing with the rhythm. TWS Pairing Connect two speakers to a device for enhanced sound quality, resulting in true stereo output. Next page 1 Excellent Sound Quality 2 Hands-free Calling 3 Long Time Music Enjoy 4 Dancing with Lighting 5 Dual X-GO Speaker Pairing

Enjoying music on foot Whether you're camping, hiking, or trekking, X-GO speaker's solid design allows it to fit easily into your backpack and is easy to carry. Add an extra touch of musical excitement to your journey.

Bluetooth 5.3 Technology This Bluetooth speaker is compatible with a wide range of devices and allows you to enjoy your music without interruption up to 66 feet away. Exclusive Design A sleek design with a polished finish makes it the ideal audio device for both indoor and outdoor use.

Music Anywhere, Anytime Take your music with you wherever you go with our portable Bluetooth speaker. Perfect for outdoor events and adventures. Pair Your Playlist The multi-color options of the speaker allow you to match your music and enhance your mood with vibrant hues.

How to Pair Two Bluetooth Speakers? 1. Turn on two speakers. 2. Ensure they're not paired. Long press play/pause to disconnect from the previous device. 3. Press play/pause on one speaker until prompt tone. 4. Go to Bluetooth settings, tap speaker name X-GO, and pair. What is the maximum playtime for the Bluetooth speaker? The speaker can play up to 24 hours with the light off. However, the actual playtime may vary based on factors such as volume level, audio content, and usage. What type of adapter is recommended to charge the Bluetooth speaker? We recommend using a 5V/1A adapter to help extend the battery life. The adapter is not included in the box. What is the waterproof rating of BolaButty Bluetooth speaker? The speaker has an IPX5 waterproof rating. For waterproofing, ensure the rubber flap is tightly sealed. We do not recommend completely submerging the speaker in water. What's included in the box? 1 x Bluetooth Speaker 1 x Type C Charging Cable 1 x Portable Rope 1 x Quick-Start Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: I normally buy Oontz for portable speakers but I liked the look of this pink speaker and price point. In my opinion, if Oontz were to provide a 90% sound quality, this would be 88%.(It would be nice if these portable speakers had the ability to fine tune the bass, treble, and mids, because this device HAS the ability to provide great bass, treble, and mids very well, but seems to play a little more treble-y. With the right music quality or choice of music, this is a non-issue.)I'm very impressed with the sound quality, durability, type C charger port, and the lights are a nice addition. I just may switch brands for the price.Because I've heard Bose portable speakers before and was very impressed, I gave the sound quality on this speaker 4 stars, the same I would give Oontz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After my house-mate received one as a gift, I was immediately impressed with how simple, small, fun and impressive his was. I ordered one strait away and have been really happy with it. I had been looking at bigger, much more expensive blue tooth room speakers, and while I’m sure this can’t compare with those, this little guy is a great personal-space speaker. Just what it should be, and better than expected for the price. I even bought one for my sister who is Not tech savvy. Good one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound and works well
reviews.reviewText: I needed a speaker to work off my Iphone for use in my shop (using Pandora or some other music provider). This works great. Fairly simple to set up. I was also hoping it would work from my computer and it does. The range is good as well (how far the speaker can be from the computer). I'll be buying a couple more of these as the price is quite good for the value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase for the most part .
reviews.reviewText: I have used the radio shack cigar shaped speaker for my phone calls and as a BT speaker for eons. It was a bit smaller and never failed me for distance sound and phone calls as well as keeping a good charge time. Unfortunately it dropped to the floor one to many times and the charger price came lose . After using the speaker and only that one since maybe 2007 or so it was difficult to wade through a speaker to order at a reasonable price . My only complaint is that quite a few people have complained about getting an echo when I use this speaker . Other than that it sounds great . It turns of more quickly than I would like it to when. It in use but most of them do now . I hate the lights but I am used to turning them off now and the buttons work well and efficiently so far . I wish it was a bit smaller in length but over all its not a problem because I think it is more stable at this size anyway . The rubber feet are excellent to keep it from rolling as well as the triangular design . I got it at a good price and it sounds fabulous and bit more volume than my old one lets me cook and listen to news and videos without missing anything . I would give this five stars if I can figure out if the speaker is causing my phone calls at the other end to have their voice echo. My end has always been clear and perfect. Music sounds good . Voices sound fabulous and it buttons quickly . I love the stable triangular shape so it really can’t roll as my old easily did . I have not tested it for distance with signal but so far it has been a fabulous buy. It’s the best sound for the value when listening and loud enough to be able to move about while cooking . I am happy with it the longer I have had it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small box, big sound!
reviews.reviewText: Big sound in a small package! I was skeptical (& somewhat aggravated) when I saw how small it really is but when I turned it on, I was quite surprised by how loud it is. We had some charging issues for a bit but believe it was the charger we were using. Seems to charge in about 3 hrs now & plays (at high volume) for about 5 hrs. before it needs to be charged. Wish it had more bass but I'm overall satisfied with it for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound quality
reviews.reviewText: I got this speaker for when I need to play background music in my classroom, and it has been perfect. The sound quality is great and it is easy to connect to devices. It's been very durable, keeping it in my bag. I'm impressed by the battery length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little speaker
reviews.reviewText: I bought this last May and took it to the pool everyday until the end of September. I live in Texas and this little speaker was unphased in 110 degree temps and definitely got wet many times! Since summer ended I have adopted it as my bathroom speaker and use it every single day. No issues at all. One minor peeve is when the battery gets low a oriental woman actually says " battery is low!" It creeped me out for a few weeks and I could not for the life of me understand what she was saying 😆! I finally figured it out! Great product at an amazing price! For $20 I would have been happy for it to only last poolside! This is a must buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing sound quality!
reviews.reviewText: I have probably bought a half dozen or so speakers like this over the years, and this one is hands-down the best one I have ever owned! I finally had to replace a much more expensive Bose speaker, and while this isn’t on par with one 6 times the price, it has completely exceeded my expectations in quality, durability, and sound performance. It holds a charge great and the reception distance to my phone is amazing. I have used it daily and have taken it camping here in the PNW, used it when I am gardening, and just around the house doing chores. Several people have had me send them the link to buy it, and I would absolutely buy it again!
La batería dura lo suficiente, cumple con 24h (al 30% de volúmen) de uso, y si es un volumen bajo, puede durar incluso más tiempo
La bocina cumple con lo que promete estoy muy satisfecho con mi compra y el servicio también genial llegó antes de lo planeado.Muchas gracias y felicidades tanto al vendedor como a Amazon
Buen sonido y buena duración de la batería. Sería deseable que se pudiera elegir si las luces se encienden o no....
